header.title: XPontus XML Editor features
header.meta: XML Editor, XML, XSLT, XML IDE, DTD, DTD Editor, XSLT Editor, XSLT Debugger, XSL Editor, XPontus XML Editor, Java based XML Editor

section.title: XML Validation
section.p: You can choose whether or not to validate a single XML document or use the Batch Validation.

section.title: Schema validation
section.p: You can validate DTDS, XML Schema, trex files, Relaxng schemas.

section.title: Syntax highlighting
section.p: Syntax highlighting is enabled for XML related files, HTML, Java, C, C++, SQL, Perl, Python, PHP, SQL and properties files.

section.title: Multiple XSLT processors
section.p: Jd.xslt, Xalan, Saxon(6.5.5 and 8.7.1) are bundled to perform XSL transformations.

section.title: XSL transformations
section.p: Various types of XSL transformations are avaibale(XML , PDF, HTML, XML, SVG, TXT, Postscript).

section.title: Code indentation
section.p: You can clean and indent up bad HTML code. XML code indentation is also provided.

section.title: Open remote files
section.p: For now supported URL schemes are FTP and HTTP.

section.title: Multiple installers
section.p: There are many installers available for Windows, Linux or other platforms.

section.title: Multiligual support
section.p: XPontus is available in English and French. A translation is planned for Dutch and Spanish.

section.title: Most text editing functions
section.p: You can perform usual text editing functions(open, save, print, copy, paste, replace, cut, search,etc.).

section.title: Platform interoperability
section.p: As the software is written in Java, it is available on any Java enabled platforms. XPontus is known to run without any problems on Windows, Linux, MacOS, FreeBSD and Solaris.
